com.client.GUI.panels.player

Class SpellBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.client.GUI.panels.player.SpellBook

  • public class SpellBook
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates a spell book.
    Author:
    Ian

      • active

        public boolean active
        Whether the book represents an active spell.

      • spell

        public final AbstractSpell spell
        The spell. Should be unique to make sense.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpellBook

        public SpellBook(int number,
         AbstractSpell spell)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        number - the id of the new spellbook.
        spell - the spell.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the spellbook. Serves to move it in or out.

      • select

        public void select()
        Selects the spellbook.

      • deselect

        public void deselect()
        Deselects the spellbook.

      • getCommandSpell

        public CastCommand getCommandSpell(java.awt.Point target_location)
        Gets a new command associated with this spell.

      • drawTextAtTop

        public final void drawTextAtTop(int max_books)
        Draws the text at the top of the spells bar. Only draws if the spellbook is active.

      • drawTextBox

        public final void drawTextBox(int max_books,
               int x,
               int y,
               float alpha)
        Draws the text in a box.

      • drawTextAdjacent

        public final void drawTextAdjacent(int max_books)
        Draws the text adjacent to the spell book it corresponds to. Always draws.

      • draw

        public void draw(int max_books)
        Draws the spellbook.
        Parameters:
        max_books - the number of books on the player's knowledge stack. Necessary so that the book may be drawn in the right place. The book must be drawn from bottom to top to get the ordering right, but the books are added top to bottom.
